title: 10/9/17 -  'Indigenous Peoples Day'
description:
Hollywood speaks out against Harvey Weinstein ...How to reduce 'mass' shooting deaths? ...Americans are ignorant when it comes to guns ...’Scalia Speaks: Reflections on Law, Faith, and Life Well Lived’… author Ed Whelan honors Justice Scalia (www.scaliaspeaks.com) ...Remembering the first Italian-American justice on Columbus Day ... Justice Gorsuch has huge shoes to fill ...'Happy Indigenous Peoples Day' ...Handgun 101...Martin Luther and the 'moment of courage'...author Eric Metaxes tells us about a man who rediscovered God and changed the world ...Building blocks with God ...Trading freedom for slavery ...
